column1: The Petitioners in this Application, inter alia, sought the following reliefs:

column2: Grant and issue a mandate in the nature of a Writ of Certiorari, quashing
the decision taken by the 3rd and 4th Respondents to grant new permits for
addition of new buses for the Route No. 441

Grant  and 
issue  a  mandate 
in 
the  nature  of  Writ  of  Prohibition,
restraining  all  or  any  one  or  more  of  the  Respondents  and/or  their
successors in office, from calling new tenders for new permits for addition
of new buses for the Route No. 441 (Aluthgama to Matugama)
